body.p: For any student, finding space to meet for extracurricular activities can be a struggle. AirClassroom is newest answer to that conundrum. You'll be able to easily, quickly, and cheaply reserve a space for any number of activities. The classroom's integrated technology allows renters to really use the room to its fullest.
body.bodydiv: We've assebled topics on searching and reserving a space, how to open the room, and the closing procedure, as well as instructions on how to use the technology that comes in the room, as well as how to connect to the WiFi.
